SEARCH
Package edu.setokk.astrocluster.validation

Interface IValidatable

All Known Implementing Classes:
InterestPdfAnalysisRequest, LoginRequest, PerformClusteringRequest, RegisterRequest
public interface IValidatable
This interface should be implemented by all classes that represent the request bodies of all endpoints.

It provides an easy way for request data to be validated just by implementing preValidate() and postValidate() methods.

NOTE: This class should only be used for simple validations. For service based validations, please see IValidator

  • Method Details

    • validate

      default void validate() throws BusinessLogicException
      Throws:
      BusinessLogicException

    • preValidate

      default void preValidate() throws BusinessLogicException
      Checks for basic errors (empty lists, field lengths etc.)
      Throws:
      BusinessLogicException - if any error in the request body was detected

    • postValidate

      default void postValidate() throws BusinessLogicException
      Performs various actions if preValidate() was successful (no errors were found).

      Examples of such actions are:
      • Set default values for unspecified fields
      • Check if values correspond to certain enums
      Throws:
      BusinessLogicException - if any error in the values themselves was found (ex. value does not exist for enum)

    • errorPrefix

      default String errorPrefix()
